Front End Developer

Self-taught way back in the late 90s, when you couldn’t move for spacer GIFs and framesets, my code is now beautifully sparse.

I believe in choosing the right tools for every job; at the moment, that means most (but by no means all) of HTML5 Boilerplate/320andup, a rock-solid CSS reset (or perhaps Bootstrap if the project justifies it), and usually jQuery (although I’m equally at home with native JavaScript or other popular libraries).

I’ve used preprocessors such as SASS in the past, but have generally found I’m just as fast without them.

View Source

Want to see some code? Have a look at the source of this site, or browse the templates in one of my GitHub projects.
